long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Highlight the label based on your own settings.

how to use:
1. Click on the plugin icon. Click the add Label button in the pop-up settings page.
2. In the pop-up settings page, enter the name of the tag you want to highlight.
3. Select the color you want to highlight in the pop-up settings page.
4. Click the save change button
5. Can add multiple tags and delete added tags
